channel.title: Help with emote glitch
channel.description:
I need help with a few emote glitches... and also, would it even be possible to control the up/down movement of your character as they walk? As you will see in this video, many of my animations are screwed up because of the landscape, and not moving vertically correctly.
[url=http://www.ayudascape.tsuite.net/videos/Movie_0001.wmv]Download here[/url]
Don't post unless you have watched the video and have a [b]legit[/b] answer to the main point of the topic.

item.title: Help with emote glitch
item.dc:creator: @xx_nub_xx xx nub xx
item.description:
@xx_nub_xx wrote:

I need help with a few emote glitches… and also, would it even be possible to control the up/down movement of your character as they walk? As you will see in this video, many of my animations are screwed up because of the landscape, and not moving vertically correctly.

Download here
